Package Logic.Hiking

Class Hike

java.lang.Object
Logic.Hiking.Hike
public class Hike extends Object
hike class to store information about the Hikes that users may attend

    • access

      public void access(Customer customer) throws Hike.HikeAccessDeniedException
      method to check whether the user has access to the hike
      Parameters:
      customer - this is the user for which we are checking his access
      Throws:
      Hike.HikeAccessDeniedException - this is the exception thrown when the user does not have access to the hike
